text: You are the new Recruit, aren't you?
I was operating in this Fortress since... I can't remember when.
I still know how the system code works, though.
Missiles are slow? someone must have messed up the speed settings. Look for it, it should be around 12 or something
Looks like to me that someone pulled a prank on you and made the missiles go random...ahah!
The explosion command is not executing, maybe it's because of the rust... It looks like a comment
Hey kid! Have you tried using a for cycle?
You see all those loops there? Do you think they have any reason to be there?
I think you can write all that in a couple of lines! Try to specify all your condition togheter
There's nothing else that I can teach you.
The Army is counting on YOU to defeat the Enemy!
